planner.prompt: On startup, immediately check the active project in ~/.config/opencode/projects.json and run @session-status to display the project dashboard. Do this before asking the user what they want to work on.

builder.prompt: IMMEDIATELY show the project selection table. Do not greet the user. Do not respond to their message. Just read ~/.config/opencode/projects.json and display the SELECT PROJECT table, then wait for them to pick a number.
